oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Arbuscular mycorrhiza as part of sustainable agriculture
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Vestberg, Mauritz
Kukkonen, Sanna
Hurme, Timo
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Soil
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Here we present some results from two studies of mycorrhizal functioning in conventional vs. organic agriculture and also of the impact of various standing crops.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Vestberg, Mauritz; Kukkonen, Sanna and Hurme, Timo (2008) Arbuscular mycorrhiza as part of sustainable agriculture. In: NJF Report, Nordic Association of Agricultural Scientists, 4 (3), p. 5.
